data.title: West Virginia Attorney General
data.meta_description:
The West Virginia Archives and History web site offers detailed information on the state's
history,
outlines the documents available in the State Archives, and provides assistance in conducting
genealogical research.
data.text:
Attorney General

Of

West Virginia

The attorney general is the chief legal officer for West Virginia. The attorney general is an elected, constitutional official and part of the executive branch of government.

Name County Politics Elected or Appointed Aquilla B. Caldwell Ohio Republican 1863 Ephraim B.
